'''Healing''' refers to the ability to regenerate [[HP]]. This can be done via [[Food]], Character Talents, or special Domain effects. Some Healing abilities apply team-wide, others only to the individual.

Two attributes, [[Healing Bonus]] and [[Incoming Healing Bonus]], will affect the amount of HP healed as follows:
:<math>\begin{align} \text{Healing Amount} = {} & \text{Base Healing Amount} \\ & \times (1 + \text{Healing Bonus}_\text{Healer} + \text{Incoming Healing Bonus}_\text{Target}) \end{align}</math>
